RAE.TYPES.statusEffect.FIELDS.statusId.h: The status effect to apply when one of the events occurs.
RAE.TYPES.statusEffect.FIELDS.overlay.hi: Display the status effect as an overlay.
RAE.TYPES.statusEffectEvents.FIELDS.acti: What to do with the status effect.
RAE.TYPES.activeEffect.FIELDS.uuid.label: Active Effect
RAE.TYPES.activeEffect.FIELDS.uuid.hint: The Active Effect to use when a token enters the Region.
RAE.TYPES.activeEffect.FIELDS.disable.hi: Disable the active effect when leaving the Region instead of deleting it.
RAE.TYPES.activeEffectEvents.FIELDS.acti: What to do with an active effect.
RAE.TYPES.activeEffectEvents.FIELDS.uuid: The Active Effect to add or reset duration.
RAE.TYPES.activeEffectEvents.FIELDS.name: Effect Name
The name of the active effect to enable/disable/delete.
